text: Stromillo by Carmelo Giunta. Antonino Maria Stromillo (5 June 1786, Gorga Cilento - 7 January 1858, Caltanissetta) was an Italian Roman Catholic bishop. From 1845 until his death he was the first bishop of the new Diocese of Caltanissetta. Category:Bishops of Caltanissetta Category:1786 births Category:1858 deaths
title: Antonino Maria Stromillo
